object.name: unidade
object.property: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf8'?> <model xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:users="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/users" xmlns:lingua="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/lingua" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="contato" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Contato</title> </field> <field name="endereco" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Endereço</title> </field> <field name="como_chegar" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Como chegar</title> </field> <field name="assinatura" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Assinatura das notícias</title> </field> </schema> </model>
